mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, IFNULL(up.nickname, c.comName) AS writerName FROM board b LEFT JOIN userProfiles up ON b.userNo = up.userNo LEFT JOIN company c ON b.comNo = c.comNo ORDER BY b.boardRegDate DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit};

SELECT b.boardNo, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, IFNULL(up.nickname, c.comName) AS writerName FROM board b LEFT JOIN userProfiles up ON b.userNo = up.userNo LEFT JOIN company c ON b.comNo = c.comNo WHERE b.boardNo = #{boardNo};

SELECT c.commentNo, c.boardNo, c.userNo, c.comNo, c.adminName, c.commentContent, c.commentRegDate, IFNULL(up.nickname, com.comName) AS writerName FROM comment c LEFT JOIN userProfiles up ON c.userNo = up.userNo LEFT JOIN company com ON c.comNo = com.comNo WHERE c.boardNo = #{boardNo} ORDER BY c.commentRegDate ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (userNo, comNo, adminName, boardTitle, boardContent, boardRegDate) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{comNo}, #{adminName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, NOW());
INSERT INTO comment (boardNo, userNo, comNo, adminName, commentContent, commentRegDate) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{comNo}, #{adminName}, #{commentContent}, NOW());
